title: The removal of fiora from my account
body: Recently I have played a match where I realized that fiora was kinda busted and I don't wanna associate with this champion from my account, I will be greatful, thank you. IGN wannawiz

replies.body: Hey, sorry to hear she hasn't been the best experience.  If you have any details on what you mean by busted, our QA team would be glad to check it out if it's a bug via the[ bug report boards](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).  Otherwise, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can look into removing her from your account though I cannot guarantee a refund.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RdEdUNcg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-27T18:28:23.967+0000)
>
> Hey, sorry to hear she hasn't been the best experience.  If you have any details on what you mean by busted, our QA team would be glad to check it out if it's a bug via the[ bug report boards](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).  Otherwise, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can look into removing her from your account though I cannot guarantee a refund.

Busted means that the champion kit is broken, as in unfair for the enemies, and i dont want a refund i want her gone from my account
What kind of request is this, i dont know how to feel
